long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When user do a search in Google, our extension will submit a similar search to the user defined library OPAC web site, and display the search result from OPAC along with the book cover images above the Google search result. When user click the image, it will bring user to the library OPAC with item detail description and allow user reserve this book online.
